医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
烟草如何重塑口腔：研究吸烟者和非吸烟者的口腔微生物组发表在《科学报告》上的一项研究调查了吸烟者、无烟烟草使用者和非烟草使用者口腔微生物组多样性的差异，揭示了烟草使用引起的显着变化。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240508/How-tobacco-reshapes-the-mouth-Stuying-the-oral-microbiome-in-smokers-and-non-smokers.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240508/How-tobacco-reshapes-the-mouth-Stuying-the-oral-microbiome-in-smokers-and-non-smokers.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7ddacc29-3ff9-46e7-8ab3-6410a9f590f1 Wed, 08 May 2024 22:27:00 -0400 How tobacco reshapes the mouth: Studying the oral microbiome in smokers and non-smokers
研究人员增强 CAR-T 细胞靶向实体瘤的能力美国国家癌症研究所指定的蒙特菲奥里爱因斯坦综合癌症中心 (MECCC) 的研究人员表明，治疗血癌的突破性疗法可以适用于治疗实体瘤，这一进步可能会改变癌症治疗。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240508/Researchers-enhance-CAR-T-cells-to-target-solid-tumors.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240508/Researchers-enhance-CAR-T-cells-to-target-solid-tumors.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=63762368-7f20-4ed8-a49b-d25b28e202df Wed, 08 May 2024 21:54:45 -0400 Researchers enhance CAR-T cells to target solid tumors
AVAnT1A 研究：调查儿童早期 COVID-19 疫苗接种和 1 型糖尿病风险1 型糖尿病是一种自身免疫性疾病，会导致葡萄糖代谢紊乱。它需要终身胰岛素治疗。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240508/AVAnT1A-study-Investigating-early-COVID-19-vaccination-and-type-1-diabetes-risk-in-high-risk-children.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240508/AVAnT1A-study-Investigating-early-COVID-19-vaccination-and-type-1-diabetes-risk-in-high-risk-children.aspx#评论https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=73c64539-92f9-4f8d-9d6a-acb6cb4fc800 Wed, 08 May 2024 21:29:00 -0400 AVAnT1A study: Investigating early COVID-19 vaccination and type 1 diabetes risk in children
新鲜度很重要：研究发现新蜂蜜具有更强的抗菌作用研究人员发现，匈牙利蜂蜜的抗菌效力，包括对抗呼吸道病原体的功效，会随着储存时间的延长而下降，这强调了医疗应用中对新鲜来源的需求。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240508/Freshness-matters-Study-finds-newer-honey-packs-a-stronger-antibacterial-punch.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240508/Freshness-matters-Study-finds-newer-honey-packs-a-stronger-antibacterial-punch.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6fe5e451-d3bd-484c-94f7-ddabee4c316c Wed, 08 May 2024 21:23:00 -0400 Freshness matters: Study finds newer honey packs a stronger antibacterial punch
研究为脊柱裂的原因提供了新的见解加州大学圣地亚哥分校医学院的一组研究人员领导了一项研究，为人类神经系统最常见的结构性疾病脊柱裂的病因提供了新的见解。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240508/Research-offers-new-insight-into-the-causes-of-spina-bifida.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240508/Research-offers-new-insight-into-the-causes-of-spina-bifida.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=691cefab-3f97-44d4-942d-421e964b2670 Wed, 08 May 2024 21:20:49 -0400 Research offers new insight into the causes of spina bifida
发布新的临床指南以有效管理肥厚型心肌病患者美国心脏病学会 (ACC) 和美国心脏协会 (AHA) 今天发布了一项新的临床指南，用于有效管理诊断为肥厚型心肌病 (HCM) 的个体。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240508/New-clinical-guideline-released-for-efficiently-managing-individuals-with-hypertropic-cardiomyopathy.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240508/New-clinical-guideline-released-for-efficiently-managing-individuals-with-hypertropic-cardiomyopathy.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=121a672e-6f9b-4ab1-926c-94217450941a Wed, 08 May 2024 21:13:49 -0400 New clinical guideline released for effectively managing individuals with hypertrophic cardiomyopathy
研究显示社交媒体的使用与青少年心理健康问题的增加有关研究人员详细介绍了社交媒体如何塑造青少年的行为、认知和神经生物学变化，从而增加他们对心理健康问题的脆弱性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240508/Social-media-use-linked-to-rising-teen-mental-health-issues-study-reveals.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240508/Social-media-use-linked-to-rising-teen-mental-health-issues-study-reveals.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=80382722-c8c8-41fd-b5db-16525d7387a7 Wed, 08 May 2024 20:46:00 -0400 Social media use linked to rising teen mental health issues, study reveals
临床试验显示 CRISPR 基因编辑具有治疗罕见失明的令人兴奋的潜力最近发表在《新英格兰医学杂志》上的一项研究调查了基因编辑的潜在用途，以纠正一种称为 CEP290 的先天性视网膜变性，这种变性会导致早发性视力丧失。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240508/Clinical-trial-shows-CRISPR-gene-editing-has-exciting-potial-to-treat-a-rare-form-of-blindness.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240508/Clinical-trial-shows-CRISPR-gene-editing-has-exciting-potial-to-treat-a-rare-form-of-blindness.aspx#评论https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c5a21444-f7ce-4dbe-a29c-a1254d2c9c52 Wed, 08 May 2024 10:28:00 -0400 Clinical trial shows CRISPR gene editing has exciting potential to treat a rare form of blindness
与智力障碍相关的基因可以调节学习和记忆人们发现一种先前与智力障碍有关的基因可以调节小鼠的学习和记忆。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240508/Gene-linked-to-intellectual-disability-can-regulate-learning-and-memory.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240508/Gene-linked-to-intellectual-disability-can-regulate-learning-and-memory.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3c66b4f8-c575-4479-9b75-a2db4a1914f7 Wed, 08 May 2024 07:39:28 -0400 Gene linked to intellectual disability can regulate learning and memory
新型头戴式设备有望缓解抑郁症状研究发现，一种产生超低频超低磁场的头戴式设备可以改善四名被诊断患有重度抑郁症的男性患者的症状。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240508/Novel-head-mounted-device-shows-promise-in-alleviating-depression-symptoms.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240508/Novel-head-mounted-device-shows-promise-in-alleviating-depression-symptoms.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ff5670a9-00ad-43fe-a86f-96c31117f56f Wed, 08 May 2024 07:23:16 -0400 Novel head-mounted device shows promise in alleviating depression symptoms
